headings.whoToMakeBookFor: Who would you like to make the book for?

labels.relationshipToChild: What is your relationship to the child?

validation.tooLongForBook: That's too long for the book.
validation.selectRelationship: Please select your relationship to the child.
validation.consentRequired: You must provide consent to proceed.

consent.defaultConsentText: [Please select your relationship to the child above to see the appropriate consent message]
consent.parentGuardianText: I confirm I am the parent or legal guardian of this child, I am over 18, and I consent to providing these details for creating a personalized storybook in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
consent.otherRelationshipText: I confirm I am over 18 and have permission from the child's parent or guardian to provide these details for creating a personalized storybook in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

instructions.noOneElse: No one else should be in the picture
instructions.faceEdges: Face & hair should not touch the edges
instructions.noObstructions: Hands or objects should not obstruct the face

minimum.career: At least 5 photos required for preview

privacy.standard: We follow strict data privacy standards.
privacy.confidential: The photos are kept confidential and are only for crafting the personalised book.

errors.invalidType: Invalid file type. Allowed types are: PNG, JPG, JPEG, JFIF, GIF, WEBP, HEIC, HEIF, TIFF, BMP, SVG, ICO, AVIF
errors.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds 20MB limit. Current size: {{size}}MB
errors.dimensionsTooSmall: Image dimensions too small. Minimum size is 100x100 pixels.
errors.dimensionsTooLarge: Image dimensions too large. Maximum size is 5000x5000 pixels.
errors.previewUnavailable: This preview is no longer available. Please create a new preview.

consent.photosConsent: I consent to the secure processing of these photos solely for creating the personalized storybook. Photos will be deleted after 24 hours if I do not save the preview by providing my email and after 1 year even if I do save the preview. I understand I can withdraw consent at any time by contacting support@imagitime.com

BookPreview.differentPhotoQuestion: Want to try a different photo?
BookPreview.editPagesQuestion: Want to edit page selection or add photos?

noUsablePhotos.heading: No Usable Photos
noUsablePhotos.text: We were unable to use any of your uploaded photos in the story preview due to one or more of the following reasons:

reasons.multiplePeople: Multiple people present in the photo
reasons.faceEdges: Face or hair intersecting the edges

noUsablePhotos.uploadPrompt: Please use the "Upload More Photos" button to add suitable images.

instructions.instruction1: Pages get shown one below the other
instructions.instruction2: Swipe and leave each page at the option you like best
instructions.postOrderInstructions1: Press 'Change Picture' button to swipe to alternative choices for a page
instructions.postOrderInstructions2: Once you're satisfied with all pages, press the "Approve For Printing" button
instructions.postOrderSwipeInstructions1: Swipe among the page choices and bring each page to the option you like
instructions.postOrderSwipeInstructions2: Once all pages are finalized, press the "Approve For Printing" button
instructions.fixedInstructions1: The pages will get shown one below the other
instructions.fixedInstructions2: Press 'Change Picture' button to swipe to alternative choices for a page

status.deleted: The generated book as well as uploaded photos have been deleted and are no longer available.
status.printing: This book has already been sent for printing.

child.text: "Never seen my daughter's eyes light up like that for any gift I have ever given her."
child.author: Ashley S

child.text: "OBSESSED! The quality, the illustrations, the story- all of it!"
child.author: Kristen

child.text: "My son was absolutely fascinated by the story and himself being the main character."
child.author: Teddy

child.text: "Amazing, unique product - customer service OUTSTANDING - will now be my go to gift."
child.author: Ellie

child.text: "It's a keepsake. This also makes for a really amazing personalized gift for my friends kids."
child.author: Ritika

child.text: "This is the best gift one can give to their kids!"
child.author: SNJ

child.text: "Very simple to put together. An excellent quality of the finished book."
child.author: Anna

child.text: "I have ordered 4 books and the experience has been par excellence."
child.author: Surbhi K.

child.text: "This is a fabulous quality beautiful book. It's worth the money and a Lovely present."
child.author: Gill

adult.text: "My girlfriend was completely overwhelmed with happiness. This is a keepsake for life."
adult.author: Liam D

adult.text: "This is a fabulous quality beautiful book. Its worth the money and a Lovely present."
adult.author: Gill

adult.text: "I wanted to give him something unique, and this book captured everything he means to me."
adult.author: Olivia K

adult.text: "Good experience from start to finish. Very pleased and would recommend this company."
adult.author: A Daly

adult.text: "I just received my order. I love the book!!! The quality is exquisite and their customer service is great."
adult.author: Victorina P

adult.text: "My boyfriend said he didnt think I noticed all these little things about him. This book meant the world to him."
adult.author: Amelia R

adult.text: "The book is beautifully done and the customer experience has been par excellence."
adult.author: Janice

adult.text: "She kept smiling and saying, 'This is so me!' It was the perfect gift."
adult.author: Michael T

adult.text: "This book is incredible. The pictures were so realistic looking that Amy was left speechless."
adult.author: Jake C

headings.makeSpecial: Make the book even more special

descriptions.personalTouch: Add a personal touch to your gift.
descriptions.heartfeltMessage: Whether it's words of encouragement or a special note, delight them with a heartfelt dedication message.
descriptions.customize: You'll be able to customize the message after purchasing.

descriptions.charLimit: Less than {{chars}} characters and maximum {{lines}} separate lines.

placeholder.default:
Dear {{name}},

May your dreams be as boundless as the sky and your spirit always soar high. Wishing you the best always.

Love, Mom & Dad

thankYou.heading: Thank You!
thankYou.message: We have added your personalised message. Please review the dedication page (page 2) by going to the book preview and double-check for any typos or grammatical errors.

printFreeze.heading: This book has already been given for printing
printFreeze.message: It is not possible to customize the dedication message any longer. For any queries, please reach out to support@imagitime.com

instructions.enterOTP: Please enter the code sent to your email

messages.verifyError: An error occurred while verifying code
